title: 1936년 Schwab 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Schwab. 판결일: 1936-12-28. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: John Schwab v. Joseph Krysiewicz and Anna Krysiewicz, John Kwiatkowski and Frances Kwiatkowski, and Corn Exchange Bank Trust Company, as Trustee for Andrew Navoni, under the Last Will and Testament of James F. Navoni, (Trust 4), and Others
**판결일**: 1936-12-28
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 249 A.D. 782

## 판결문 요약


Action in ejectment. Judgment dismissing the complaint unanimously affirmed, with one bill of costs. No opinion. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Carswell, Davis, Johnston and Taylor, JJ.
...
